column4: i will repeat my question , if anybody can answer meh: installed plugins for mp3 play, everytime i open an mp3 with Totem Movie Player the program just closes without no errors. what could be the problem
without no errors would be with errors, so it is a fair question.
It could several things.  Maybe the mp3 files are bad.  You might not have the right totem plugin.  Have you tried vlc on the mp3 files?
